languages.text: Осмотрев техотсек и сверившись с авгурами, Лорд-капитан предположил{mf||а}, где могут находиться неповрежденные компоненты корабля.

traits.locale_text: Осмотрев техотсек и сверившись с авгурами, Лорд-капитан предположил{mf||а}, где могут находиться неповрежденные компоненты корабля.

languages.text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.
languages.original_text: Осмотрев техотсек и сверившись с авгурами, Лорд-капитан предположил{mf||а}, где могут находиться неповрежденные компоненты корабля.

traits.locale_text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augers, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.
After examining the service bay and consulting the augers, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.
After examining the service bay and consulting the augers, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.
After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.

languages.text: Tras examinar la bahía de servicio y consultar a los augures, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} indicó la posición probable de los componentes intactos de la nave.
languages.original_text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.

traits.locale_text: Tras examinar la bahía de servicio y consultar a los augures, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} indicó la posición probable de los componentes intactos de la nave.

languages.text: 舰长大人检查了维修区域，询问了俄歇矩阵扫描结果之后，便指示侦察兵前往特定区域寻找尚未损坏的部件。
languages.original_text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人检查了维修区域，询问了俄歇矩阵扫描结果之后，便指示侦察兵前往特定区域寻找尚未损坏的部件。

languages.text: サービスベイを調べ、スキャナーと相談した上で、ロード・キャプテンは船の傷ついていない部品が見つかりそうな場所を提案した。
languages.original_text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.

traits.locale_text: サービスベイを調べ、スキャナーと相談した上で、ロード・キャプテンは船の傷ついていない部品が見つかりそうな場所を提案した。

languages.text: Nach der Untersuchung der Wartungsbucht und der Befragung der Auguren äußerte der Lord Captain eine Vermutung, wo die unbeschädigten Komponenten des Schiffs zu finden sein müssten.
languages.original_text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Untersuchung der Wartungsbucht und der Befragung der Auguren äußerte der Lord Captain eine Vermutung, wo die unbeschädigten Komponenten des Schiffs zu finden sein müssten.

languages.text: Après avoir examiné l'aire de service et consulté les scrutateurs, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} suggéra où trouver des composants intacts.
languages.original_text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir examiné l'aire de service et consulté les scrutateurs, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} suggéra où trouver des composants intacts.

languages.text: Hizmet bölmesini inceleyip alametlere danışan Lord Kaptan, sağlam malzemelerin gemideki konumu hakkında varsayımda bulundu.
languages.original_text: After examining the service bay and consulting the augurs, the Lord Captain suggested where the ship's undamaged components could be found.

traits.locale_text: Hizmet bölmesini inceleyip alametlere danışan Lord Kaptan, sağlam malzemelerin gemideki konumu hakkında varsayımda bulundu.
